## formale Definition finite Elemente {#sec-def-finites-element}

Das in Kap. @sec-gleichgewicht definierte Randwertproblem lässt sich nach Ableitung in die schwache Form (@sec-schwache-form) als Bilinear- und Linearform durch
$$
a(w,\delta w) = b(\delta w)
$$

ausdrücken.


The first aspect, and certainly the most characteristic, is that a triangulation ffh is established over the set ii, i.e., the set ii is subdivided into a finite number of subsets K, called finite elements, in such a way that the following properties are satisfied:
